name: london
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of England and the United Kingdom, in the south-east of England on the River Thames. It has a population of over 13 million people and is the location of the UK Parliament, the King's main home Buckingham Palace, the Bank of England, and the London Stock Exchange.
